title.rendered: Can I Share a Deleted File Without Restoring It?

content.rendered: Yes, you can share any file located in Dumpster via Gmail, Hangouts, WhatsApp, Skype and more. Simply select the item, tap on the share icon located on the lower right hand side, and select the app through which you would like to share the file.
